String.string: No, no, X doesn't mark the spot. I used circles instead.
I love the anticipation before opening a treasure chest.
Search for the frozen chest around the shipwreck, Batia's Hulk, east of Frostclaw Lake.
Obtain keys from the drowned gula bosuns around Frostclaw Lake.
Deliver the keys and chest to Tantan.
The chest is open. Speak to Tantan again.
Find Yasper at the Beacon Point Garrison.
